COM S 319.comment: This class is really fun! You gain experience on multiple different projects!
I really appreciated having in class activities. This allowed me to ask questions about the course content whenever I was confused.
Amazing class! I had a great time.
Beware: There are occassional pop quizzes in this course. However, they are extra credit.
I loved how much freedom we were given in our projects. It was nice to be able to work on a website that I actually cared about.

COM S 321.comment: This class helps you understand how computers actually work. So far, we have learned a lot about computer memory and assembly code.
I really enjoyed this class. Just make sure to do the readings and attend lecture!

COM S 417.comment: I realy like this class. Right now, we are learning about automated gui testing. I really appreciate that we have in class activities to learn how to use the testing programs before we do our assignments.
Great class! Make sure to attend lectures, though!

POL S 385.comment: This was definitely one of my favorite classes. Fair warning, it is pretty reading heavy, but it all feels worth it.
I recommend this class to everyone I know. However, it is an exam heavy course.

POL S 344.comment: I liked that one of our assignments was to write a policy proposal. This helped me understand them even more.
Make sure to keep up with the class if you take it online!

PHIL 343.comment: This class was very interesting. I loved that we were able to choose our own topics for the final paper.

PHYS 231.comment: Difficult class, make sure to ask for help often.

PHYS 232.comment: Make sure you aren't taking too many other hard classes at the same time as this course.

MATH 166.comment: This class was very hard, but very rewarding.

MATH 265.comment: I recommend watching Steve Butler's YouTube videos when you study for this course.
